sentences.cn: 一杯加汽水的苏格兰威士忌

sentences.en: Egan crossed to the drinks cabinet and poured a Scotch.
sentences.cn: 伊根穿行来到酒柜旁，倒了一杯苏格兰威士忌。

sentences.en: Facts will eventually scotch these rumours.
sentences.cn: 这种谣言在事实面前将不攻自破.

sentences.en: He polished off his scotch and slammed the glass down.
sentences.cn: 他一仰脖喝完苏格兰威士忌，砰的一声把杯子放下。
他为自己倒了一杯苏格兰威士忌。

sentences.en: He tossed back the remainder of his scotch.
sentences.cn: 他一口干掉了剩下的威士忌酒.

sentences.en: He's got a broad Scotch accent.
sentences.cn: 他说话带有浓重的苏格兰口音.

sentences.en: Italy was full of fine views and virtually empty of Scotch whiskey.
sentences.cn: 意大利多的是美景,真正缺的是苏格兰威士忌.

sentences.en: Michael served some anisette to the Don and scotch to Tom Hagen.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔给老头子斟了些茵香酒,给汤姆-黑根斟了些苏格兰威士忌.

sentences.en: Patterson went straight to the liquor cabinet and extracted a bottle of Scotch.
sentences.cn: 帕特森径直走到酒柜前，取出一瓶苏格兰威士忌。

sentences.en: She expected him to ask for a scotch and was rather nonplussed when he asked her to mix him a martini and lemonade.
sentences.cn: 她料想他会要一杯苏格兰威士忌，所以当他请她调一杯马提尼酒加柠檬水时，她有点不知所措。

sentences.en: Slote took a spoonful of gummy Scotch broth.
sentences.cn: 斯洛特喝了一匙粘糊糊的苏格兰肉汤.

sentences.en: The lads had spent all evening tanking up on scotch.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们整晚都在狂饮苏格兰威士忌.

sentences.en: They drove on fortified with still more Scotch.
sentences.cn: 他们又喝了一些苏格兰威士忌，继续驾车前行

words.tran_cn: 反对,阻碍,击退,妨害,使无效
弄伤；制止转动；扑灭；镇压

trans.tran_cn: 扑灭，使…受伤，切开，划开，制止转动
